trans-unit.source: Eager Cadet
trans-unit.target: 热切的军校生

trans-unit.source: "Training? Seeing my crops burnt to cinders was all the 'training' I needed."
trans-unit.target: 「训练？ 对我来说，看到自己的庄稼被烧得一干二净，就是最好的训练了。」

trans-unit.source: Vengeance
trans-unit.target: 复仇

trans-unit.source: Destroy target tapped creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标已横置的生物。

trans-unit.source: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.
trans-unit.target: 苦涩如青蒿，甜美如香酒。

trans-unit.source: Coral Eel
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚礁鳗

trans-unit.source: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.
trans-unit.target: 有些渔夫爱吃鳗鱼，也有些鳗鱼爱吃渔夫。

trans-unit.source: Giant Octopus
trans-unit.target: 巨章鱼

trans-unit.source: "Before my eyes was a horrible monster, worthy to figure in the legends of the marvellous. . . . Its eight arms, or rather feet, fixed to its head . . . were twice as long as its body, and were twisted like the furies' hair."\n—Jules Verne, *Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea*, trans. Lewis
trans-unit.target: 「在我眼前的可怕怪物，真是足以列入奇闻传说里面呢…脑袋上长的与其说是八只胳膊，倒不如说是八只脚…有它身躯的两倍长，像疯婆子的头发那样乱舞。」 ～朱尔·凡尔纳，《海底两万里》

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 编纂索引

trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌，再将它们以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.source: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."
trans-unit.target: 「我查查看…玛洛，玛珂，玛凯迪亚…你瞧，我真的需要个更好的归档系统。」

trans-unit.source: Vizzerdrix
trans-unit.target: 威瑟垂克斯

trans-unit.source: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made *that* mistake again.
trans-unit.target: 一个穷极无聊的法师，有一天用兔子与水虎鱼作出了威瑟垂克斯。 而他再也没机会犯同样的错误。

trans-unit.source: Goblin Raider
trans-unit.target: 精灵突击队

trans-unit.source: Goblin Raider can't block.
trans-unit.target: 精灵突击队不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: He's smart for a goblin. He can do two things: hit *and* run.
trans-unit.target: 就精灵而言，他算是聪明的。 他会做「两」件事：打和跑。

trans-unit.source: Enormous Baloth
trans-unit.target: 庞大巴洛西

trans-unit.source: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.
trans-unit.target: 他的食物包括水果，植物，林地里的小动物，林地里的大动物，林地，果园，果农，以及小城镇。

trans-unit.source: Spined Wurm
trans-unit.target: 刺棘亚龙

trans-unit.source: "I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now *that's* a plan!"\n—Wandering mage
trans-unit.target: 「孩子，我不会待在那亚龙前面。 当然我也不会待在他后面。 事实上呢，待在那亚龙身旁不是明智之举， 快跑才是上策！」 ～流浪法师

trans-unit.source: Cowardice
trans-unit.target: 怯懦

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand. (It won't be affected by the spell or ability.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，将该生物移回其拥有者手上。 （此生物不会受到该咒语或异能的影响）

trans-unit.source: "Cowards die many times before their deaths;\nThe valiant never taste of death but once."\n—William Shakespeare, *Julius Caesar*
trans-unit.target: 「懦夫死过好多次； 勇士只死一次。」 ～威廉‧莎士比亚，《凯撒大帝》

trans-unit.source: Lumengrid Warden
trans-unit.target: 博识都护持师

trans-unit.source: His peers derive knowledge from ancient tomes locked within dark spires. He finds knowledge within the solitude of a lifetime spent watching the Quicksilver Sea.
trans-unit.target: 他此生此世都将独身伫立水银海旁， 凝视着深锁于黑暗尖塔的古籍，自中汲取知识。

trans-unit.source: Mahamoti Djinn
trans-unit.target: 神灯巨灵

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（只有具飞行异能的生物才能阻挡它。）

trans-unit.source: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.
trans-unit.target: 神灯巨灵乘着风的翅膀，拥有大气精怪中的高贵血统。 他是诡计与误导的专家，不论身处赌场或战场都是一等高手。

trans-unit.source: Mind Bend
trans-unit.target: 曲解心意

trans-unit.source: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "nonblack creature" to "nongreen creature" or "forestwalk" to "plainswalk." This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 更改目标永久物的规则叙述文字；将其中一种颜色文字全部更改为另一种，或是将一种基本地类别文字全部更改为另一种。 （例如你可以将「非黑生物」修改为「非绿生物」，或是将「树林行者」修改为「平原行者」。此效应不因回合结束而终止）

trans-unit.source: Mind Bend

trans-unit.source: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "nonblack creature" to "nongreen creature" or "forestwalk" to "islandwalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)
trans-unit.target: 更改目标永久物的规则叙述文字；将其中一种颜色文字全部更改为另一种，或是将一种基本地类别文字全部更改为另一种。 （例如你可以将「非黑生物」修改为「非绿生物」，或是将「树林行者」修改为「平原行者」。此效应不因回合结束而终止）

trans-unit.source: Phantom Warrior
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战士

trans-unit.source: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战士不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "There are as many pillows of illusion as flakes in a snow-storm. We wake from one dream into another dream."\n—Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Illusions"
trans-unit.target: 「幻影梦枕犹如漫天雪花无尽。 我们自梦境醒转，又进入另一个梦境。」 ～拉尔夫‧沃尔多‧爱默生，《幻影》

trans-unit.source: Plagiarize
trans-unit.target: 剽窃

trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，若目标牌手将抓一张牌，则改为该牌手略过该次抓牌，并且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Are you thinking what I'm thinking?"
trans-unit.target: 「你想的和我一样？」

trans-unit.source: Polymorph
trans-unit.target: 型态转变

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card into play and shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。 它不能重生。 其操控者自他的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。 该玩家将该牌放置进场，并将所有其它以此法展示的牌洗入其牌库中。

trans-unit.source: Polymorph
trans-unit.target: 型态转变

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。 它不能重生。 其操控者自他的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。 该玩家将该牌放置进场，并将所有其它以此法展示的牌洗入其牌库中。

trans-unit.source: "Getting people to do what you want is merely a matter of telling them what they want to hear."
trans-unit.target: 「驱使别人去做你想要他做的事，最好的方法就是说他想听的话。」

trans-unit.source: Reminisce
trans-unit.target: 追忆过往

trans-unit.source: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其坟墓场洗回牌库。

trans-unit.source: Leave the door to the past even slightly ajar and it could be blown off its hinges.
trans-unit.target: 就算只替往事留个小门缝，泉涌的回忆也可能让门招架不住。

trans-unit.source: Sea Monster
trans-unit.target: 大海妖

trans-unit.source: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
trans-unit.target: 除非防御牌手操控海岛，否则大海妖不能攻击。

trans-unit.source: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.
trans-unit.target: 这种怪物的传说很容易给当成迷思～直到你感到三十万磅的迷思重重压上船身。

trans-unit.source: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {U}{U}{U}，{T}：将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "If yesterday was two days ago tomorrow, will the day after tomorrow be today or yesterday?"\n—Temporal Manipulation 101 final exam, Tolarian Academy
trans-unit.target: 「如果昨天到了明天会变成两天前，试问后天应该是今天或是昨天？」 ～时间操纵绪论期末考， 陶拉里亚大学院

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（只有具飞行异能的生物才能阻挡它。）

trans-unit.source: Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当窃鹊向对手造成伤害时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies steal jewels for theirs.
trans-unit.target: 一般鸟儿收集细枝筑巢， 鹊则是偷窃宝石来筑巢。

trans-unit.source: Thought Courier

trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "There's an assortment to satisfy all your needs: deep, fleeting, dirty, pure, scientific, philosophical, after, and even fore. For a price."
trans-unit.target: 「有种类别可以满足你所有需求：专注，浮动，污秽，纯净，科学，哲理，之后，甚至事前。 只要点代价。」

trans-unit.source: Tidal Kraken
trans-unit.target: 潮汐巨怪

trans-unit.source: Tidal Kraken is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: 潮汐巨怪不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: To merfolk, pirates are a nuisance. To pirates, merfolk are a threat. To the kraken, they're both appetizers.
trans-unit.target: 对人鱼而言，海盗是麻烦； 而对海盗来说，人鱼是威胁。 但对巨怪来说，他们都是开胃菜。

trans-unit.target: 「虽然信件长达数页，我只要瞧瞧信差的表情便能晓得重点。」 ～法术大师巴林

trans-unit.target: 精神受创

trans-unit.source: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库从顶上算起一半数量的牌置入其坟墓场，小数点以下舍去。

trans-unit.source: You won't know what you're missing.
trans-unit.target: 你不会晓得自己少了什么。

trans-unit.target: 发掘物

trans-unit.source: {2}{U}{U}: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}{U}：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Wealth means power; the power to subdue, to crush, to exploit, the power to enslave, to outrage, to degrade."\n—Emma Goldman, "Anarchism"
trans-unit.target: 「财富即力量；是征服，压榨，剥削的力量，是奴役，施暴，堕落的力量。」 ～艾玛‧高德曼，「无政府主义」

trans-unit.source: Wanderguard Sentry
trans-unit.target: 巡卫哨兵

trans-unit.source: When Wanderguard Sentry comes into play, look at target opponent's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当巡卫哨兵进场时，检视目标对手的手牌。

trans-unit.source: It allows those with dangerous weapons to pass. But not those with dangerous thoughts.
trans-unit.target: 它不会挡下带有危险武器的人， 而是挡下藏着危险思想的。

trans-unit.source: Wind Drake
trans-unit.target: 风龙兽

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（只有具飞行异能的生物才能阻挡它。）

trans-unit.source:
"But high she shoots through air and light,
Above all low delay,
Where nothing earthly bounds her flight,
Nor shadow dims her way."
—Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"
trans-unit.target: 「但她穿越天际与白昼 直到所有牵挂之上 彼处无尘俗羁绊她的飞翔 也没有阴影蒙蔽道路」 ～托玛斯‧摩尔，「假如我有翅膀」

trans-unit.source: Withering Gaze
trans-unit.target: 枯萎的凝视

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。 其中每有一张树林或绿色牌，你便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Nature cares not for the knowledge to be gained from its study. Better to bleed it dry, lest its potential be wasted on lizards and leaves."
trans-unit.target: 「大自然可不在乎能从自身推敲出什么知识。 最好是把它榨干，免得其潜力浪费在蜥蜴与叶子上。」

trans-unit.source: Withering Gaze
trans-unit.target: 枯萎的凝视

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。 其中每有一张树林或绿色牌，你便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Nature cares not for the knowledge to be gained from its study. Better to bleed it dry, lest its potential be wasted on lizards and leaves."
trans-unit.target: 「大自然可不在乎能从自身推敲出什么知识。 最好是把它榨干，免得其潜力浪费在蜥蜴与叶子上。」

trans-unit.source: Zur's Weirding
trans-unit.target: 祖尔的奥秘

trans-unit.source: Players play with their hands revealed.
trans-unit.target: 牌手以展示手牌的方式进行游戏。

trans-unit.source: If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws the card.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何牌手将要抓一张牌，则他改为展示该牌。 然后其它任何牌手可以支付2点生命。 若有牌手如此做，则将该牌置入其拥有者的坟墓场。 若无人支付，则该牌手抓该张牌。

trans-unit.source: Zur's Weirding
trans-unit.target: 祖尔的奥秘

trans-unit.source: Players play with their hands revealed.
trans-unit.target: 牌手以展示手牌的方式进行游戏。

trans-unit.source: If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何牌手将要抓一张牌，则他改为展示该牌。 然后其它任何牌手可以支付2点生命。 若有牌手如此做，则将该牌置入其拥有者的坟墓场。 若无人支付，则该牌手抓该张牌。

trans-unit.source: Blackmail
trans-unit.target: 勒索

trans-unit.source: Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手从手上展示三张牌并且你从中选择一张。 该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: In addition to killing peasants, punishing subordinates, and raising an army of nightmares, Braids somehow found time for her favorite hobby: petty extortion.
trans-unit.target: 在杀害乡民，责罚部下，壮大梦魇军队之外，布蕾德总算有时间来从事最爱的嗜好：小额敲诈。

trans-unit.source: Blackmail
trans-unit.target: 勒索

trans-unit.source: Target player reveals three cards from their hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手从手上展示三张牌并且你从中选择一张。 该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: In addition to killing peasants, punishing subordinates, and raising an army of nightmares, Braids somehow found time for her favorite hobby: petty extortion.
trans-unit.target: 在杀害乡民，责罚部下，壮大梦魇军队之外，布蕾德总算有时间来从事最爱的嗜好：小额敲诈。

trans-unit.source: Cruel Edict
trans-unit.target: 残酷勒令

trans-unit.source: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: "No mockeries now for them; no prayers nor bells, / Nor any voice of mourning save the choirs,— / The shrill, demented choirs of wailing shells."\n—Wilfred Owen, "Anthem for Doomed Youth"
trans-unit.target: 「再也无人嘲弄他们的样子；没人为其祈祷或鸣钟，／也没有悼念之声可略掩那合奏，／～刺耳，令人发狂的尖啸子弹合奏曲。」 ～威尔菲德‧欧文， 「献给注定丧命之青年的圣歌」

trans-unit.source: Dark Banishing
trans-unit.target: 黯境放逐

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。 它不能重生。

trans-unit.source:
"Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say 'death,'
For exile hath more terror in his look,
Much more than death."
—William Shakespeare, *Romeo and Juliet*
trans-unit.target: 「嘿，放逐？ 慈悲一点，判我死吧， 流放带着恐怖的面貌， 比死亡更教我畏惧。」 ～威廉‧莎士比亚，《罗蜜欧与茱丽叶》

trans-unit.resname: 9ED·123 | Death Pits of Rath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Death Pits of Rath
trans-unit.target: 瑞斯死渊

trans-unit.resname: 9ED·123 | Death Pits of Rath | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物受到伤害时，将其消灭。 它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: 9ED·123 | Death Pits of Rath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Neither could I forget what I had read of these pits—that the *sudden* extinction of life formed no part of their most horrible plan."\n—Edgar Allan Poe, "The Pit and the Pendulum"
trans-unit.target: 「我也无法忘记关于这些深渊的记叙～生命突然灭绝的惨事，在他们可怕至极的计划中还不值一提。」 ～爱伦‧坡， 「陷阱与钟摆」

trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The best ideas often come from the worst minds.
trans-unit.target: 最好的点子常常出自最坏的心灵。

trans-unit.target: 恶魔导师

trans-unit.source: Drudge Skeletons
trans-unit.target: 苦力骷髅妖

trans-unit.source: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
trans-unit.target: {B}：重生苦力骷髅妖。 （如果此生物下一次于本回合中将被消灭，则它不会被消灭， 而是改为将它横置，移除所受的所有伤害，并将它移出战斗。）

trans-unit.source: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."\n—Nevinyrral, *Necromancer's Handbook*
trans-unit.target: 「死者可成为良好的士兵。它们不会违背命令，它们从不投降，它们也不会因为身上随便哪块部份掉下来就停止战斗。」 ～妮维亚洛，《死灵术士手册》

trans-unit.source: Scathe Zombies
trans-unit.target: 枯萎灵俑

trans-unit.source:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"
trans-unit.target: 「它们呻吟、碰撞，站起身来， 口不言语，眼不理睬； 看到死人如此复生， 即使在梦中，还是很古怪。」 ～山缪‧泰勒‧柯律芝， 「古舟子咏」

trans-unit.target: 每位牌手牺牲四个地。 野火对每个生物各造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Fire is always at the top of the food chain, and it has a *big* appetite.
trans-unit.target: 火焰永远在食物链的顶端，而且它的胃口很大。

trans-unit.source: Anaconda
trans-unit.target: 大水蛇

trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者（只要防御牌手操控沼泽，此生物便不能被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: If you're smaller than the anaconda, it considers you food. If you're larger than the anaconda, it considers you a lot of food.
trans-unit.target: 如果你比大水蛇小，它会把你当成一点食物； 而如果你比大水蛇大，它会把你当成一堆食物。

trans-unit.source: Craw Wurm
trans-unit.target: 巨爪亚龙

trans-unit.source: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.
trans-unit.target: 巨爪亚龙最可怕之处，大概便是他高速冲过森林时所造成的恐怖声响了。 那巨大的声响在树间回荡不歇，有如同时从四面八方而来。

trans-unit.source: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

trans-unit.target: {2}：翠玉雕偶成为3/6神器生物直到战斗结束。 此异能只能在战斗中使用。

trans-unit.source: "The paradox of jade statues is that their victims never really expect attack, but they are never completely surprised either."\n—Kabel, Tolarian archivist
trans-unit.target: 「关于翠玉雕偶的奇谈：命丧其手的人固然都是猝然遇袭，但他们也并非全无防备。」 ～陶拉里亚书库辖员卡贝尔

trans-unit.source: Jester's Cap

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

trans-unit.source: "Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses."\n—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist
trans-unit.target: 「要了解敌人的弱点，也要了解敌人的优点。」 ～索地威工匠阿肯．达格森

It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
